function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in cruise ship rooms up to 17 days after vacated","Impact":"Potential contamination of environment and surfaces","Mitigation":"Thorough cleaning and disinfection of rooms and surfaces","Technologies":"Disinfectants, UV-C sanitation","People":"Cruise ship passengers, staff, and future occupants","Owner":"Cruise ship management, cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Persistence of SARS-CoV-2 in aerosols in different environmental conditions","Impact":"Potential airborne transmission of virus","Mitigation":"Improved indoor ventilation, air filtration systems","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV air disinfection systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Variation in stability of SARS-CoV-2 based on temperature and humidity","Impact":"Influence on virus survival and transmission","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling indoor environmental conditions","Technologies":"HVAC systems, humidity sensors","People":"Indoor occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Facility managers, public health officials"}]}
